about:
Hi, I am Brady Dorsey. I am a Developer from Houston, TX, with a background in logistics and data technology.


Graduated from Flatiron School with a certificate in Software Engineering, I have a passion for learning new technologies, creating full stack web applications and video games. My transition into programming has been driven by my motivation to innovate and make an impact on future generation technology. I hope to use my skills in order to create innovative solutions and empower businsses to thrive.
